channel.title: Home on subin kim 🍊
channel.description: Recent content in Home on subin kim 🍊

item.title: Coffee
item.description:
all my favorite coffee shops, told in memories (what would i be without coffee?) ☕️

📍 Chicago, IL

Plein Air: one and only hyde park spot—ideated korean honorifics project here!

necessary & sufficient coffee: sunday reading spot in printers row 📚

Philz: never worked in store, but love their honey haze 🐝🍯

📍 Philadelphia, PA

Elixr: favorite weekend study spot (strawberry matcha latte)

Saxbys: discovered chatter lab posting here 🤭

K’Far: nothing ever beat pre-study sesh pistachio sticky bun and yemenite iced coffee

item.title: Papers
item.description:
Papers

In prep

Kim, S. & Casillas, M. (in prep). Pragmatic development of Korean honorifics: a corpus analysis of child- directed speech and early childhood production.

Zhang, Y., Kim, S., Casillas, M. (in prep). Word order, morphological typology, and method predict the size of the noun bias: A meta-analysis.

Presentations

Conference talks

Zhang, Y., Casillas, M., & Kim, S. (2024). Word order, morphological typology, and method predict the size of the noun bias: A meta-analysis. Talk presented at the Boston University Conference on Language Development. Boston, MA, USA.
